channel.title: Everything you need to start a server! (Newb friendly. APPROVED) V1 NO VIEWS SRY
channel.description:
[b] This is Taharok approved. Now stfu[/b] Hai Moparscape.
Have any of you taken a look in the help section? Alot of complaining about compilers, Tutorials, Servers. Well, Guess what?
That problem is done with! All with my Exe (Installer). The package contains Sources, Links, Tutorials, and more. Don't trust me? Here's a scan for you noobfags [IMG]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x34/luke_livez/3-1.jpg[/img]
Taharok's Seal of approval [IMG]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x34/luke_livez/seal.jpg[/img] From IRC.
[u]Links[/u] [url=http://files.filefront.com/P+I+M+P+3+D+Tutexe/;13620249;/fileinfo.html] Mirror # 1[/url] [b]Filefront[/b] [url=http://www.MegaShare.com/778228] Mirror # 2[/url] [b]MegaShare[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?3ugnjmtqmlm] Mirror # 3[/url] [b]Mediafire[/b] [url=http://ragesoft.nationvoice.com/P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut.exe]Mirror # 4[/url] [b]Custom, Thanks Taharok.[/b] [i]More Mirrors to come..[/i] Feel free to upload more for me. If you download leave a comment or I'll pee on your forehead.
Q: What does this contain? A: This package contains Helpful links, HTML Files, PDF Files, Some beginner sources, The Java basics and hosting programs (No-ip, Hamitchi)
Q: OMG ?!?!?!? E ECKS E HALP VIRTUSSOJFOJEFJEFKJ#RKLGJEKLRGJ@!#@$%^$^$ A: No.
Q: Oman Lewk com up wiff new chezburger?!!?! A: No.
Q: Why did you choose Exe instead of uploading it as A Zip file? A: Because some people don't know how to use Winrar, 7zip and other decompression programs. So I decided to make it into an executable file format, and everything is done for you.
Q: HOW I USE?!?!?!?!?!!?!?!?!?!??!?!?! A:
Well , First you download the file from one of the given links. Run the file, You should see.. [IMG]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x34/luke_livez/1-1.jpg[/img] Click "Install". Depending on your computer speed, It will vary for how long it takes to install. For regular computers, It'll take around 10-20 seconds. When it's done, Click "finish". Now look at your desktop, You should see.... [IMG]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x34/luke_livez/2-1.jpg[/img] And there you go!
[u]Credits[/u] Me, For scripting the Executable and organizing everything. Taharok, For giving helpful advice && Uploading a mirror. Wolf, Creator of Project 16 Hayzie, Creator of Emulous Sun micro systems, Creators of Java
P.S. Think I should add anything else into V2? Please, Feel free to leave a comment about what I should add.
[size=15pt]Any questions, Comments, or concerns? Please, Leave a comment![/size]
Thanks, ~P I M P 3 D Tut
